en: Mafouo did not see this person.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kilé mêngáb wɔ̀ɔn, à kíle we.
en: I tamed my chicken, let him tame his.

ngiemboon: Mêngáb Fǒpaʼ pɔ́ we Nkʉŋne kẅɛ̌.
en: Fopa's hen and Kenne's hen are out.

ngiemboon: Mé tǒo ńgwoon mekúnɔ̀ɔn, aweg kwɛ.
en: Stopping the pigs, ours came out.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyǎ nkẅíŋ, n ge lúɔ wég.
en: I saw the wood, I'll ask for ours.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńgwoon mêngwé we, á nyé wege.
en: If he stops his dog, he leaves ours.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ jʉ̌ nkẅíŋ, pɔ́ té wégè jʉ.
en: They stole the wood, they didn't steal ours.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kaa gyǎ mêngáb welÿò wɔ́.
en: I didn't see the big hen.

ngiemboon: Líe kúnɔ̀ɔn wembòŋo, ńná né mèŋ.
en: Look at the best pork to give me.

ngiemboon: N kaŋá mêngáb, á náa wendyɛ̀ʼɛ né mèŋ.
en: I chose the chicken, he gave me another one instead.

ngiemboon: Peg ge jú nkáʼ sẅé lɔg kúbe wenzẅìŋ.
en: We are going to buy a new field, to replace the old one.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ sǎŋ tà ńkúu na wéshÿɔ́ʼɔ?
Kwáŋ gẅie à jǔ aa wesẅé.
en: The bike he bought is new.
This field is smaller than the other.
